name: Escape (itch) (dhammon2)
description: Over the past few months my team and I have been putting together a puzzle escape game that we thought would be fun since it the player has to think about their every move. Escape. Sounds pretty self explanatory right? The goal of the game is to escape an insane asylum. The only way to escape is to collect all three keys by completing different puzzles. Seems easy? You should give it a try.
